title: User Registration with Clerk Authentication
description: Validate that a new user can successfully register using Clerk authentication, including email verification and syncing user data to Convex database.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid user details including email and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify registration success message is displayed.
Verify that email verification is sent and user is prompted to verify.
Complete email verification.
Verify user record is created and synced in Convex database.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Ensure that users can log in successfully with valid credentials via Clerk and their session is properly established and handled.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid email and password.
Click on login button.
Verify login success and redirection to homepage or dashboard.
Ensure user session is persistent and user data is loaded.

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails with invalid email or password with appropriate error messages displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid email and/or password.
Click on login button.
Verify error message indicating invalid credentials appears.
Ensure user is not logged in nor session created.

title: Password Reset Workflow
description: Test the password reset process including request, email delivery, and password update.

steps.description: Navigate to the reset password page.
Enter a registered email address.
Submit password reset request.
Verify that a password reset email is sent.
Use the password reset link received in email.
Input a new password and confirm.
Confirm password is updated and user can log in with new password.

title: Browse Beats Store and Apply Filters
description: Verify the beats marketplace can be browsed and filtering by genre, BPM, and price works correctly with results updating dynamically.

steps.description: Navigate to the shop page.
Apply genre filter and verify only beats of selected genre are displayed.
Apply BPM filter and verify the filtered results are within the selected BPM range.
Apply price filter and verify results match the price criteria.
Use search input to locate specific beats by title or artist.
Verify search results correspond to the query.

title: View Beat Product Details and License Selection
description: Ensure the beat detail page loads correctly with accurate information, license options, and audio preview with waveform visualization.

steps.description: From the shop page, select a beat to view details.
Verify beat title, artist, genre, BPM, and pricing information are displayed.
Verify license selection options appear and can be changed.
Play audio preview using waveform player.
Confirm playback controls (play, pause, seek, volume) work properly.

title: Add Beat to Shopping Cart
description: Validate adding beats to cart from product details and verify cart updates accordingly.

steps.description: On beat detail page, select license type.
Click 'Add to Cart' button.
Verify item is added to cart with correct license and quantity.
Navigate to cart page and verify cart contents reflect added items.
Verify total price updates correctly.

title: Update Shopping Cart Quantities and Remove Items
description: Ensure users can update quantities of beats in the cart and remove items, with cart totals updating correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to shopping cart page.
Increase quantity of a beat and update cart.
Verify total price and quantity reflect updates.
Remove a beat from the cart.
Verify item is removed and cart updates accordingly.

title: Checkout Process for Registered User
description: Verify that an authenticated user can complete the checkout process using Clerk Billing integration and receive order confirmation.

steps.description: Log in as registered user.
Navigate to cart page and proceed to checkout.
Complete payment using Clerk Billing options.
Verify payment is successful.
Confirm order confirmation page is displayed with order details.

title: Guest Checkout Workflow
description: Ensure that a guest user can add items to cart and complete checkout with minimal information and payment processing.

steps.description: Navigate to shop and add a beat to cart without logging in.
Proceed to checkout as guest.
Enter required billing and payment information.
Complete the purchase using Clerk Billing integration.
Verify order confirmation is displayed.

title: Subscription Plan Selection and Billing
description: Validate that authenticated users can select subscription plans (Basic, Artist, Ultimate), complete billing transactions, and view accurate quota usage.

steps.description: Log in as registered user.
Navigate to subscription management page.
Select a subscription plan and proceed to payment.
Complete payment using Clerk Billing integration.
Verify subscription status is updated to selected plan.
Verify quota usage is displayed correctly on dashboard.

title: Audio Player Waveform Playback and Controls
description: Test the audio playerâ€™s ability to display waveform, control playback (play, pause, seek, volume) and persist playback state across navigation and page reloads.

steps.description: Navigate to a beat detail page and start audio playback.
Verify the waveform visualization is rendered smoothly.
Use play, pause, seek, and volume controls.
Playback reflects controls actions accurately.
Navigate to a different page while audio is playing.
Verify global playback persists with controls accessible.
Reload the page during playback.
Verify playback state persists correctly after reload.

title: User Dashboard Analytics and Downloads Access
description: Verify authenticated users can access dashboard to view analytics charts, order history, download purchased beats, and subscription status accurately.

steps.description: Log in as registered user.
Navigate to the user dashboard.
Verify analytics charts display correct data.
Verify order history lists past purchases correctly.
Attempt to download a purchased beat.
Verify download completes successfully.
Verify subscription status and quota are shown correctly.

title: Service Booking Form Submission
description: Test the service booking system by submitting mixing, mastering, recording session, and custom beats requests with valid and invalid data.

steps.description: Navigate to the service booking page.
Fill out booking form with valid data and submit.
Verify success confirmation is displayed.
Attempt to submit the form with missing or invalid required fields.
Verify appropriate validation error messages are shown.

title: Favorites, Wishlist and Recently Viewed Beats Management
description: Verify users can add beats to favorites and wishlist, manage them, and that recently viewed beats update accurately.

steps.description: On a beat page, add the beat to favorites and wishlist.
Verify the beat is added to both favorites and wishlist.
Navigate to wishlist page and remove an item.
Verify item is removed successfully.
Browse multiple beats to generate recently viewed list.
Verify recently viewed beats section updates correctly.

title: Multi-Language and Currency Localization
description: Test that the application supports multiple languages using i18next and currency localization based on selected locale or geolocation.

steps.description: Change application language using language selector.
Verify all UI text translates accordingly.
Change currency settings or simulate geolocation change.
Verify prices and currency symbols update according to selected locale.

title: Responsive Layout and Navigation Across Devices
description: Verify that navigation, layout, and UI components adapt and render correctly across defined breakpoints from mobile to ultra-wide screens.

steps.description: Resize browser window or use device emulator to test different screen widths.
Verify navbar, footer, menus, and key UI components layout adapt responsively.
Ensure mobile touch controls and bottom navigation work correctly on small screens.

title: Performance Benchmarks Validation
description: Validate performance with Lighthouse scores above 90, First Contentful Paint under 2 seconds, smooth 60fps animations, and lazy loading functionality.

steps.description: Use Lighthouse tool to audit homepage and key pages.
Verify Lighthouse performance score is above 90.
Verify First Contentful Paint occurs in under 2 seconds.
Check animations run smoothly at 60fps without jank.
Verify lazy loading and code splitting are employed for images and components.

title: Accessibility Compliance for WCAG 2.1 AA
description: Verify UI components and pages meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards including keyboard navigation, ARIA attributes, color contrast, and screen reader compatibility.

steps.description: Navigate across the site using keyboard only navigation.
Verify all interactive elements are focusable and operate correctly via keyboard.
Use accessibility audit tools to check color contrast and ARIA attributes.
Verify screen reader correctly interprets UI components and conveys information.

title: Security Testing: XSS and CSRF Prevention
description: Test that application inputs and forms are protected against Cross-site Scripting (XSS) and Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks.

steps.description: Attempt to inject scripts or malicious input through forms and URL parameters.
Verify that inputs are sanitized and no scripts execute.
Submit forms without valid CSRF tokens where applicable.
Verify server rejects requests without proper CSRF protections.

title: Error Handling and UI Feedback
description: Ensure that all errors including network failures, payment errors, and invalid data submissions are handled gracefully with user-friendly messages.

steps.description: Simulate network errors or API failures during user actions like checkout or data fetching.
Verify meaningful error messages are displayed and app remains stable.
Trigger payment errors such as declined card during checkout.
Verify payment error page displays accurate information and recovery options.
Access invalid routes.
Verify custom 404 page is shown.

title: Admin Panel Content and User Management
description: Validate that admin users can access the admin panel, manage content (beats, users), and find synchronization dashboard functions without errors.

steps.description: Log in as admin user.
Navigate to admin panel pages.
Perform content management actions such as adding/editing/removing beats.
Verify changes are saved and reflected across application.
Navigate to user management and synchronization dashboards.
Verify user data loads and synchronization status is accurate.

title: Loyalty and Rewards Program Validation
description: Verify user earns loyalty points and rewards properly after transactions, and transaction history updates accurately.

steps.description: Complete an order as a registered user.
Verify loyalty points are credited correctly.
Navigate to loyalty and rewards section.
Verify rewards grid and transaction history display updated data.

title: SEO Meta Tags and Structured Data Verification
description: Ensure that relevant pages include SEO meta tags, OpenGraph metadata, and structured data markup for rich search results.

steps.description: View page source or use SEO tools to inspect meta tags on homepage, product pages, and blog/static pages.
Verify standard meta tags (title, description, keywords) are present and accurate.
Verify OpenGraph meta tags for social media sharing are included.
Verify structured data markup complies with schema.org standards.
